version_description:
Head’s up, True Believers!

We’re diligently updating to make your app better! We squashed a bunch more bugs in this release.

Unlimited Plus Users: You can now view your membership card in Apple Wallet. Show it off!

Make sure you update to continue using your Marvel Unlimited Subscription.

Make sure you update to continue using your Marvel Unlimited Subscription.

Attention! You MUST update to the latest version of the app by 4/3 to continue enjoying your Marvel Unlimited Subscription.

Heads up, True Believers!

We’ve now added push notifications! Opt in to be the first to hear about awesome new issues, discover lists, and more.

We squashed a few more bugs too!

Having problems with the App? We want to hear from you! Send us a note to onlinesupport@marvel.com or tweet us @marvelsupport.

Having problems with the app? We want to hear from you! Send us a note to onlinesupport@marvel.com or tweet us at @marvelsupport

We squashed a bunch of pesky bugs in this release. Don’t tell Ant-Man!

• Restored missing series in the Browse section
• Fixed an issue where comics were appearing in Currently Reading that you have not read
• Smashed a bug when adding a book from Discover into your Library caused the app to crash

Have problems with the app? We want to hear from you! Send us a note to onlinesupport@marvel.com or tweet us at @marvelsupport.

We squashed a bunch of pesky bugs in this release. Don’t tell Ant-Man!

• Restored missing series in the Browse section
• Fixed an issue where comics were appearing in Currently Reading that you have not read
• Smashed a bug when adding a book from Discover into your Library caused the app to crash

Have problems with the app? We want to hear from you! Send us a note to onlinesupport@marvel.com or tweet us at @marvelsupport.

We squashed another bunch of pesky bugs in this release. Don’t tell Ant-Man!

* Fixed an issue where duplicate comics were appearing in your library and in your offline queue
* Smashed a bug where books were not appearing in Currently Reading when they should be
* Sped up loading of your books when opened from a Discover List

Have problems with the app? We want to hear from you! Send us a note to onlinesupport@marvel.com or tweet us at @marvelsupport.

We squashed another bunch of pesky bugs in this release. Don’t tell Ant-Man!

* Fixed an issue where duplicate comics were appearing in your library and in your offline queue
* Smashed a bug where books were not appearing in Currently Reading when they should be
* Sped up loading of your books when opened from a Discover List

Have problems with the app? We want to hear from you! Send us a note to onlinesupport@marvel.com or tweet us at @marvelsupport.

Your Currently Reading list now syncs across all your devices! The first time you open MU after updating, the books in Currently Reading will be sent to the cloud and then they’ll stay consistent everywhere. If you read books offline, the next time you connect to the network we’ll send those up to the cloud too.

Important note: this only happens once per account. Open the upgrade first on the device on which do most of your reading!

As always, keep sending all feedback to onlinesupport@marvel.com. Thanks for being part of MU!

Important note: this only happens once per account. Open the upgrade first on the device on which do most of your reading!

As always, keep sending all feedback to onlinesupport@marvel.com. Thanks for being part of MU!

You can now sign up for Marvel Unlimited right in the app using your Apple ID!

Also, this will be the final update that supports iOS 8. Please update your iOS to continue getting the latest updates to Marvel Unlimited.

Questions and comments? Send them to onlinesupport@marvel.com

Bugs fixed, crashes squashed and polish applied.

Previously, on Marvel Unlimited 3.3:
Looking for something new to read? Want to find the best way to make your way through Civil War II? The newly redesigned Reading Lists section is for you!
- Discover has been renamed to Reading Lists!
- Reading Lists is organized into categories!
- More easily find custom lists for specific Characters, Events, Series, Creators, This Week in Marvel Unlimited Reading Club, and more!
- New to Comics? There's a Reading List for that!
- Looking for the Hidden Gems in MU's vast archives? There's a list for that too!
- Lists are added or updated every week, so check back often!

This version should look great on your shiny new iPhone X.

Currently Reading will now sync better when you’ve closed the app while in the middle of reading a book.

Added some polish on those new Reading List categories, and other bug fixes.

Questions and comments? Send them to onlinesupport@marvel.com

Took a good long look at read offline. It should give you clearer feedback about what's currently and finished downloading, and downloaded reads should be much more consistent when you're offline.

Questions? Comments? Email us at onlinesupport@marvel.com

This release includes bug fixes for the comic detail screen and some performance enhancements.

Please send any questions or comments to onlinesupport@marvel.com

We hit a major milestone! Marvel Unlimited now offers subscribers access to over 25,000 comics spanning Marvel's 80 year history!

This release also includes:
- New loading screen
- Support for the latest iPad Pro
- Bug fixes and performance improvements

Please note that we will be removing iOS 9 support in an upcoming build. Send any questions or comments to onlinesupport@marvel.com

Added more bug fixes and performance enhancements.

Non-subscribers will be introduced to the service through a set of onboarding screens.

Please send any questions or comments to onlinesupport@marvel.com

Subscribers can now pin reading lists to their home screen. Get started by browsing our extensive collection of reading lists and look for the 'Pin to Home' toggle.

Not sure what to read next? Get introduced to a random comic from our extensive library by tapping on the Marvel Unlimited icon on the home screen.

Users can also view each issue in a series directly from the comic detail screen with the Previous and Next buttons.

Some more bug fixes as well.


Please note that support for iOS 9 has officially ended.

Please send any questions or comments to onlinesupport@marvel.com

PLEASE NOTE: Subscribers must update to the latest version of Marvel Unlimited to avoid interruption in service. Earlier app versions will no longer be supported.

More updates and adjustments have been made to our sign in process. If you need to reset your password for an existing account, please tap Sign In and then “Need help signing in?”.

If you are experiencing any issues, please send any questions or comments to onlinesupport@marvel.com

PLEASE NOTE: Subscribers must update to the latest version of Marvel Unlimited to avoid interruption in service. Earlier app versions (version 4.6.1 and below) will no longer be supported.

More updates and adjustments have been made to our sign in process. If you need to reset your password for an existing account, please tap Sign In and then “Need help signing in?”.

This release also includes some bug fixes including a fix for viewing downloaded comics when offline.

If you are experiencing any issues, please send any questions or comments to onlinesupport@marvel.com
